FILE_PATH=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' < /dev/stdin) && if [ -n "$FILE_PATH" ] && echo "$FILE_PATH" | grep -qE '\.(ts|tsx|js|jsx|json|css|md)$'; then npx prettier --write "$FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null; fi
